message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe has immense value. Given its unique features and benefits, we are confident it could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. We are offering this exceptional product for $15000. Please let us know if this aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, my budget allows me to spend up to $10000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for your product.
